message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a decent price for the product. I can sell it to you for $145, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the last round, and I'm still not sure if we can meet on a price. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product, which is the same as my previous offer. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $145, Bob. I'm starting to think we're at an impasse. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium service package that's normally worth $20, absolutely free. This is my final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $145.

I appreciate the extra service package, but I'm still not willing to pay $145. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product, and I'd like to take you up on the premium service package if I buy it at this price. Can you consider this price?
